statements: SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM athlete_profiles WHERE height > 180;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name FROM athlete_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT athlete_id, weight FROM athlete_profiles WHERE performance_data->>'KPI' = 'High';
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM athlete_profiles WHERE weight < 70 AND height > 170 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, height, performance_data FROM athlete_profiles WHERE weight BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY height DESC, last_name;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, training_history FROM athlete_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY first_name, last_name;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, weight, training_history FROM athlete_profiles WHERE training_history->>'experience' = 'professional' ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, height, weight FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1995-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT athlete_id, full_name FROM AthleteProfiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingHistory WHERE calories_burned > 500 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, date, exercise_name FROM TrainingHistory WHERE duration_minutes >= 60 AND duration_minutes <= 90;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, height, weight FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE height > 180 AND weight < 80;
SELECT athlete_id, full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';

SELECT full_name, gender, exercise_name, duration_minutes FROM AthleteProfiles JOIN TrainingHistory ON AthleteProfiles.athlete_id = TrainingHistory.athlete_id WHERE TrainingHistory.duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT athlete_id, date, exercise_name, calories_burned FROM TrainingHistory WHERE calories_burned > 500 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, name, gender FROM athlete_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT athlete_id, height, weight FROM athlete_profiles WHERE height > 180;
SELECT athlete_id, MAX(weight) AS max_weight FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC, height DESC
SELECT athlete_id, name, age, gender FROM athlete_profiles WHERE weight < 70 ORDER BY name
SELECT athlete_id, test_name, result FROM performance_data WHERE result >= 8 ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT athlete_id, training_date, exercise, sets, reps FROM training_history WHERE exercise = 'Squats' AND sets >= 4 ORDER BY training_date ASC
SELECT athlete_id, name, age, height, weight FROM athlete_profiles INNER JOIN training_history ON athlete_profiles.athlete_id = training_history.athlete_id WHERE training_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT full_name, height_cm, weight_kg FROM athlete_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT athlete_id, full_name, country_code FROM athlete_profiles WHERE country_code = 'USA';
SELECT athlete_id, full_name, performance_metric, value FROM athlete_profiles JOIN performance_data ON athlete_profiles.athlete_id = performance_data.athlete_id;
SELECT training_date, training_type, duration_minutes FROM training_history ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, age, height_cm, weight_kg, gender, country_code FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25
SELECT athlete_id, full_name, country_code FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT athlete_id, training_type, duration_minutes, calories_burned FROM training_history WHERE duration_minutes > 60 AND calories_burned > 500
SELECT athlete_id, performance_metric, value FROM performance_data WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT athlete_id, plan_name, target_metric, target_value FROM training_plans WHERE target_value > 1000 ORDER BY plan_name ASC
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM athlete_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT athlete_id, height, weight FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_history WHERE trainer_name = 'John Doe' AND training_type = 'Strength Training';
SELECT athlete_id, test_date, test_type, test_result FROM performance_data WHERE test_result > 90;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT athlete_id, height, weight FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_information WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT athlete_id, start_date, end_date, training_type, trainer_name FROM training_history ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, plan_name, plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
